entry.title: dmdaksh/sudoku-tauri: Sudoku Tauri is a cross-platform Sudoku game built using Tauri, TypeScript, and Rust. It provides a clean, modern interface for playing the classic number puzzle game on desktop platforms. The project leverages Tauri's lightweight and secure framework to deliver a fast and efficient application.
entry.content: Sudoku Tauri is a cross-platform Sudoku game built using Tauri, TypeScript, and Rust. It provides a clean, modern interface for playing the classic number puzzle game on desktop platforms. The project leverages Tauri's lightweight and secure framework to deliver a fast and efficient application.

entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScriptâ€”making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: Gowtham-SK-Dev/online-dev-tool: The Developer Tools website is a free, lightweight, and fully frontend-based tool designed to help developers format JSON, execute code in multiple languages, and manipulate text efficiently. The site is built using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure fast performance and Google AdSense compatibility for monetization.
entry.content: The Developer Tools website is a free, lightweight, and fully frontend-based tool designed to help developers format JSON, execute code in multiple languages, and manipulate text efficiently. The site is built using plain HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure fast performance and Google AdSense compatibility for monetization.
